idlastro/

fthelp.pro


top source fthelp

fthelp, h, TEXTOUT=TEXTOUT

NAME: FTHELP PURPOSE: Routine to print a description of a FITS ASCII table extension

CALLING SEQUENCE: FTHELP, H, [ TEXTOUT = ]

INPUTS: H - FITS header for ASCII table extension, string array

OPTIONAL INPUT KEYWORD TEXTOUT - scalar number (0-7) or string (file name) determining output device (see TEXTOPEN). Default is TEXTOUT=1, output to the user's terminal

NOTES: FTHELP checks that the keyword XTENSION equals 'TABLE' in the FITS header.

SYSTEM VARIABLES: Uses the non-standard system variables !TEXTOUT and !TEXTUNIT which must be defined (e.g. with ASTROLIB) prior to compilation. PROCEDURES USED: REMCHAR, SXPAR(), TEXTOPEN, TEXTCLOSE, ZPARCHECK

HISTORY: version 1 W. Landsman Jan. 1988 Add TEXTOUT option, cleaner format W. Landsman September 1991 TTYPE value can be longer than 8 chars, W. Landsman August 1995 Remove calls to !ERR, some vectorization W. Landsman February 2000 Slightly more compact display W. Landsman August 2005

Parameters

h

Keywords

TEXTOUT
